name: Abhishek Deshmukh

experience.title: Strategy and Operations
experience.description: Proposed a transformative operational strategy for a Continuous Pickling Line, identifying critical bottlenecks to significantly enhance process efficiency and avoid a capital-intensive replacement. Delivered data-driven recommendations to optimize resource utilization and maximize ROI.
